content: Hello!Bounty and Ambassador programs often require you to create videos. These are video reviews and translations of videos from other languages.To do this, use a speech synthesis service with neural networks https://speechgen.io/Benfints:- Cheap. Speech dubbing by robots is hundreds of times cheaper than a voiceover from a studio.- That was fast. In less than 1 minute you can voice-over a text for a 10-20 minute video.- Profitable. Video content is loved by Ambassador programs. I'm a bounty hunter myself. Recently got $400 worth of tokens from Axelar for neural network voice-over videos.Try speechgen.io and earn more on the bounty.

comments.author: peterstolypin
comments.body: SpeechGen Breaks Barriers: Now Speaking 149 Global Languages!Hey, crypto enthusiasts and ambassadors! We've just added a whopping 100 new languages, making our speech synthesizer fluent in 149 global tongues. Check out the full list here https://speechgen.io/en/voices/.But why does this matter to the crypto world? Imagine launching a new coin or token and being able to promote it authentically in Mexican Spanish, Indonesian, or even Hong Kong English. Bounty hunters, think about the vast audiences you can now tap into, from the bustling streets of Cairo to the serene landscapes of New Zealand.Participants of ambassador programs can now create promo videos for new crypto projects in most languages of the world and earn profits from it.Not just the mainstream languages, but we've got the rare ones too, like Maltese and Basque. And for those targeting specific regions, we've got 22 Spanish dialects, 15 Arabic dialects, 10 Chinese variants, and 14 English accents.In the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies, where every edge counts, SpeechGen isn't just a voice service. It's your ticket to truly global promotions, ensuring your message resonates, no matter the language. Dive into a world of opportunities with SpeechGen https://speechgen.io/

comments.author: peterstolypin
comments.body: 🎙️ Mastering Audio Segmentation in Speech Synthesis! 🎙️🔹 Easily divide synthesized speech into multiple segments.🔹 Efficiently manage all segments within a single project.🔹 Use the <cut/> tag for precise audio breaks.🔹 Step-by-step guide for beginners and pros alike.🔹 Discover the myriad benefits and applications of audio segmentation.Dive into the comprehensive guide now! 👉 https://speechgen.io/en/node/cut/

comments.author: peterstolypin
comments.body: 💥 NEW UPDATE FROM SPEECHGEN  Take control of audio file names during speech synthesis! Add the name parameter within the <cut> tag to personalize file names. Example:<cut name="name1"/>🔗 Instructions and details here Video Guide:https://youtu.be/0jFUxI89oQs
